statements: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND price < 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, price ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE price <= 100 AND category IN ('Electronics', 'Books');
SELECT category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT quantity, price, product_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold, total_price FROM inventory JOIN sales_data ON inventory.product_id = sales_data.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM inventory;
SELECT i.product_id, i.product_name, s.quantity_sold, s.total_price FROM inventory AS i JOIN sales_data AS s ON i.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 100 AND quantity > 20;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, revenue FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint';

SELECT product_name, quantity FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-02-01' AND interaction_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM FairTradeProducts WHERE origin_country IN ('Brazil', 'Kenya') AND certification_status = 'Fair Trade' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM Inventory JOIN FairTradeProducts ON Inventory.product_name = FairTradeProducts.product_name WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT order_date, product_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND price < 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_date, customer_id, product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 20;
